name: The HighSchool Experience
description:
I'm working on a game that takes place on my highschool, this is the result of a month of work on it, I plan on developing the game for what's left of the year.

EVERY asset here, models, textures, etc (except the skybox) is made by me.

 THIS IS NOT FINISHED! i know that there isn't much to do and that there are missing textures and illumination bugs, I post this because I want to get feedback on whats already in place. 

This is just the map, there is no gameplay other than walking running and jumping.

I'd love to hear from you guys, any suggestions/criticism are appreciated.

Also this is my first "game", and my first post on itch.io. I say this because i'm not completely sure if posting an unfinished game goes against the rules, if so, let me know and i'll delete the post if necessary.

CONTROLS

Walk with W A S D , run with left shift while walking, jump with spacebar and look around with the mouse.

Hardcoded to run at 60 fps.
